segments.text: Let's go to Wangfujing by bus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Better take the subway . It's faster , and more convenient .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , it will be a new experience for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a rather comprehensive subway system here . You can get almost anywhere rather quickly on a subway , especially at this time of day when the traffic is heavy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do we pay the fare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just give the man standing there 3 yuan and he'll give you a token . Then , you slip it into the slot at the turnstile and push the turnstile to get in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me pay for it . Where can I get a subway map ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ask the worker who sells tokens to give you one . It's free fo charge . Actually maps showing subway routes are posted at most stations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to pay an additional fare to change trains ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you don't have to . Here comes the train .
segments.speaker: S2
